definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[אָכַל]] Ex 34:28 + ; [[אָֽכְלָה]] Nu 21:28 + ; etc. Impf. [[יאׁבַל]] Ge 49:27 + ; [[וַיּאׁ֫כַל]] Ge 25:34 + ; [[וַיּאׁכַָל]] Ge 3:6 + ; [[יאׁכֵָל]] Le 21:22 + ; [[אׂכַל]] Ge 24:33 + ; [[וׇֽאׂכַ֫ל]] Ge 27:33; [[וְאׂכֵָל]] Is 44:19; [[וׇֽאׂבֵל]] Ge 3:12, Ge 3:13; 3 pl. [[יאׁבְלוּ]] Ge 32:33 + ; [[יאׁכֵָלוּ]] De 18:18 + ; etc. (for [[יוֹכְלוּ]] Ez Eze 42:5 rd. [[יוחלו]], [[יאחלו]] LXX Ew Co); sf. [[יאׁכְלָנּוּ]] Le 7:6 + ; [[תּאׁבַלְכֶם]] Is 33:11, etc., prob. also [[תְּאָכְלֵהוּ]] Job 20:26, either as secondary form fr. ´[[תּאׁ]] (Ew:§ 253 Di) or text. error (Ges:§ 68. l) > Pi., Thes Kö:I, 389; or Po‘el, Ki De MV; Imv. [[אֱכוֹל]] 1Ki 18:41 +, etc.; Inf. abs. [[אָכוֹל]] Ge 2:16 + ; cstr. [[אֲכׂל]] Nu 26:10 + 2 t.; [[לֶאֱכׂל]] Ge 24:33 + ; [[לְאָכְלָה]] Je 12:9; Pt. [[אׂכֵל]] ([[אוֹכֵל]]) Ge 39:6 + , [[אׂכֶלָת]] Ex 24:17 +, etc.—

eat, human subject Ge 3:11, Ge 3:18 + oft.; mostly c. acc. Ex 16:35 + ; also sq. [[מִן־]] (eat of,—some of,—or from) Ex 34:15, Ru 2:14 + ; sq. [[בְּ]] (eat of or at) Ex 12:43 f; abs. De 2:6 + ; as act of worship Ge 31:54 (cf. Ge 46:1) Ex 18:12, Ex 24:11, Ex 34:15, De 12:7, De 12:18, De 14:23, De 14:26 + ; cf. of priests Ex 29:32, Le 10:13 + ; cf. [[אָבַל אֶל־הֶהָרִים]] Ez Eze 18:6, Eze 18:11, Eze 18:15, Eze 22:9 + Eze 33:25 [[עַל־הַדָּם]] Co [[עַל־הֶהָרִים]]; (but RS:Rel. Sem. i. 324 N would emend first 4 by last); eat up, finish eating Ge 43:2 (c. [[בלה]]) 1Ki 13:28 + ; [[אָבַל לֶחֶם]] = take a meal Ge 43:25, Ex 2:20, 1Sa 20:24, Je 41:1 + ; so ´[[א]] alone Ge 43:16, 1Sa 20:5 + ; [[לֶחֶם]] ´[[א]] = eat, get food Ge 3:19, 2Ki 4:8 + ; Am 7:12 (i.e. spend one's life) cf. Ec 5:16; ´[[ל]] ´[[לאׁ א]] i.e. fast 1Sa 28:20, 1Sa 30:12, Ezr 10:6 cf. Da 10:3; fig. [[אֶת־בְּשָׂרוֹ]] ´[[א]] Ec 4:5 (i.e. waste away); eat words Je 15:16 (i.e. eagerly receive); of adultery, Pr 30:20 :[[אָֽכְלָה וּמָֽחֲתָה פִָּיהָ וְאָֽמְרָה לאׁ־ פָעַלְתּי אָֽוֶן]]; eat (taste) good fortune, [[בַּטּוֹב]] ´[[א]] Job 21:25; [[לְפִּי]] [[אָבְלוֹ]] according to his eating, i.e. acc. to his needs in eating Ex 12:4, Ex 16:16, Ex 16:18 also v:Ex 16:21; cf. Job 20:21 & sub [[אָבְלָה]]; [[אָכַל הַפְּרִי]] 2Ki 19:29, Am 9:14, of peaceful enjoyment of results of labour; fig. of receiving consequences of action, good or bad Pr 1:31, Pr 18:21, Ho 10:13 cf. [[וַיּאׁכַל גַּם־אָכוֹל אֶת־כַּסְפֵּנוּ]] Ge 31:15 i.e. he has reaped al1 the benefit, cf. Ho 7:9; fig. of mourner, [[אֵפֶר כַּלָּחֶם אָכָָלְתִּי]] Ps 102:10 (cf. Ps 80:6 Hiph., & As. akâl al âkul, bikîtum kurmatî = food I ate not., weeping (was) my refreshment Hpt:ASKT 166 f. Obv. 1. 21, 22 Zim:BP 34. 42); of gods, partaking of sacrifices De 32:38; fig. = destroy De 7:16 (cf. Nu 14:9) ; cf. Je 10:25, Je 30:16, Je 50:7, Ho 7:7.

of beasts, birds, etc., eat, devour; Ge 37:20, Ge 37:33, Ge 40:17, Ge 40:19, 1Ki 13:28, 1Ki 14:11, 1Ki 16:4, 1Ki 21:23, 1Ki 21:24, Ho 2:14 + ; specif. of locusts Joe 1:4, Joe 2:25, 2Ch 7:13 cf. Am 4:9; moth Job 13:28; flies Ps 78:45; worms De 28:39; also Ez Eze 19:3, Eze 19:6 (of Isr. under fig. of lion), cf. Je 50:7, Je 50:17, Je 51:34; also Ho 13:8 (of ´[[י]] under fig, of lion), Ez Eze 22:25 ([[נֶפֶשׁ אָכָָלוּ]], of false proph. under fig. of lion).

fig. of fire, devour, consume Le 6:3 (sq. 2 acc. consume offering to ashes) Na 3:13, Is 5:24 (in sim.), partic. of fire fr. ´[[י]] Le 10:2, Le 16:25, Ju Jdg 9:15 f, 1Ki 18:38, 2Ki 1:10, 2Ki 1:12, 2Ki 1:14, 2Ch 7:1; cf. Am 1:4, Am 1:7, Am 1:10, Am 1:12, Am 1:14, Am 2:2, Am 2:5, Am 5:6 + ; De 5:22 of fire at Sinai; of ´[[י]] as fire (in judgment) De 4:24 [[אֱלֽהֶיךָ אֵשׁ אׂכְלָה הוּא]] ´[[כִּי י]]; cf. De 9:3, Is 10:17 (‖[[בּער]]) Is 30:27, Is 30:30, Is 33:14 (‖[[מוֹקְדֵי עוֹלָם]]).
of sword, devour, slay De 32:42, 2Sa 22:26, 2Sa 11:25, 2Sa 18:8, Ho 11:6, Je 2:30, Je 12:12; cf. of devastation of land Is 1:7, Je 8:16.

in genl. devour, consume, destroy (inanim. subj.) of drought Ge 31:40; of pestilence Ez Eze 7:15; of forest 2Sa 18:8; cf. Le 26:38 [[וְאָֽכְלָה אֶתְכֶם אֶרֶץ]] [[אׂיְבֵיכֶם]]; of [[הַבּשֶׁת]] Je 3:24 (v. [[בּשֶׁת]]).
fig. of oppression, devour the poor, etc. Pr 30:14, Hb Hab 3:14 cf. Ps 14:4; of bitter enmity [[לֶאֱכׂל אֶת־בְּשָׂרִי]] Ps 27:2. (cf. Job 19:22). †

be eaten by man Ex 12:46, Ex 13:3, Ex 13:7, Ex 21:28, Ex 29:34, Le 6:9, Le 6:16, Le 6:19, Le 6:23, Le 7:6, Le 7:15, Le 7:16, Le 7:16, Le 7:18, Le 11:41, Le 19:6, Le 19:7, Le 19:23, Le 22:30, 28:17, Ez Eze 45:21; of custom, usage Ge 6:21, Ex 12:16, De 12:22, Job 6:6; of permission to eat Le 7:19, Le 11:13, Le 11:34, Le 11:47, Le 11:47, Le 17:13; c. neg. be uneatable Je 24:2, Je 24:3, Je 24:8, Je 29:17.
be devoured by fire, consumed Zep 1:18, Zep 3:8, Zec 9:4, Ez Eze 23:25.
be wasted, destroyed, of flesh Nu 12:12, Je 30:16.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[אֻכְּלוּ]] be consumed with fire Ne 2:3, Ne 2:13 cf. Na 1:10 (fig.); so Pt. [[אֻכָּל]] (= [[מְאֻכָּל]] Ew:§ 169 d) Ex 3:2; by sword Is 1:20 [[תְּאֻכְּלוּ]]. †

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. sf. [[הֶאֱכַלְתָּם]] Ps 80:6, [[וְהַאֲכַלְתִּ֫י]] Is 49:26; sf. [[וְהַאֲכַלְתִּיךָ]] cons. Is 58:14; [[הֶאֱכַלְתִּיח]] Ez Eze 16:19; [[וְהַאֲכַלְתִּים]] cons. Je 19:9; Impf. sf. [[יַאֲכִלֵנוּ]] Nu 11:4, Nu 11:18, etc.; 2 ms. js. [[תַּאֲכֵל]]; 1 S. [[אוֹכִיל]] Ho 11:4; Imv. [[הַאֲכִילֵהוּ]] Pr 25:21, etc.; Inf. [[לְהָכִיל]] Ez Eze 21:28 (but Co [[לההל]], q.v.); Pt. [[מַאֲבִיל]] Je 23:15, etc.;—

cause to eat, feed with, sq. 2 acc. subj. mostly ´[[י]]; Ex 16:32, De 8:3, De 8:16, Ez Eze 3:2, Je 19:9; abs. Ho 11:4; cf. Nu 11:4, Nu 11:18; fig. Je 9:14, Je 23:15, Is 49:26, Is 58:14, Ez Eze 16:19; also Ps 80:6 [[הֶאֱבַלְתָּם לֶחֶם]] [[דִּמְעָָה]] (cf. Ps 102:10 Qal supr.); sq. acc. pers. + [[מן]] Ps 81:17, but also subj. man Pr 25:21, 1Ki 22:27, 2Ch 18:26 [[וְהַאֲכִלֻהוּ לָחֶם לַ֫חַץ]] of prison fare ; sq. acc. pers. only 2Ch 28:15, cf. Ez Eze 2:3.
cause to devour, obj. sword Ez Eze 21:28 (but on text vid. Co).
